education.major: Bachelor of Science Metallurgy and Material Science Engineering
education.description: Graduated with a strong foundation in analytical thinking and problem-solving. Leveraged engineering principles to transition into full-stack development, applying systematic approaches to software architecture and efficient coding practices.

Completed an intensive bootcamp focused on modern web development technologies. Gained hands-on experience with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, developing full-stack applications from scratch. Collaborated with a diverse group of peers to build projects and enhance coding skills.
